name: Star Tetromino
description:
Arrange the stars of constellations into complete lines and make them pop! Ten stages of increasing challenge amidst black holes, time limits, and the usual block-puzzling convolutions await you...

I'm certain you've played something a little similar before, so I have faith you'll figure out the intricacies. See you on the leaderboards!

In case it's unclear in-game, here are the controls:

Left Click - Place PieceRight Click - Rotate PieceMiddle Click / Left Click away from the Grid - Hold Piece

If something doesn't feel quite right I implore you to download the game instead; definitely runs better as just an executable. In fact - I think most of my games do! Though if something breaks outright... Let me know about it... Please...

Credits:

• PaperDawN for the Art

• Cai Jones and Luke Evans as the Sound Designers

• Random-storykeeper for the Music

YellowAfterLife for the Custom Cursor technology

globalstats.io for the servers and API used for the online scoreboard
